ProteinName	Neural proliferation differentiation and control protein 1 (NPDC-1)
GeneName	NPDC1
Length	325
Function	Suppresses oncogenic transformation in neural and non-neural cells and down-regulates neural cell proliferation. Might be involved in transcriptional regulation (By similarity).
